videoid = #{idx} and delflag = false

select x.videoid ,x.shotid ,x.assetfilepath||x.period_num||'/' as assetfilepath ,x.image||'.jpg' as assetfilename ,x.json as object from ( select s.videoid, s.shotid, s.assetfilepath, json_array_elements(m.vtt_meta_json) as json, json_array_elements(m.vtt_meta_json) ->> 'period_num' as period_num, json_array_elements(m.vtt_meta_json) ->> 'image' as image, cast(json_array_elements(m.vtt_meta_json) ->> 'period_frame_num' as numeric) as period_frame_num from vttm_shot_tb s inner join vttm_meta_info_tb m on s.videoid = m.idx and s.shotid = m.shotid where s.videoid = #{idx} and m.userid = #{userid} and s.delflag = false )x where x.period_frame_num = (select min(y.period_frame_num) period_frame_num from ( select s.videoid, s.shotid, cast(json_array_elements(m.vtt_meta_json) ->> 'period_frame_num' as numeric) as period_frame_num from vttm_shot_tb s inner join vttm_meta_info_tb m on s.videoid = m.idx and s.shotid = m.shotid where s.videoid = #{idx} and m.userid = #{userid} and s.delflag = false )y where y.shotid= x.shotid group by y.videoid,y.shotid)
